note: LLM-ready step templates for all 56 slide layouts. Each layout entry provides: template (human-readable), instructions (concise guidance), and code (PptxGenJS snippets with x,y,w,h coordinates). All positioning uses explicit coordinates from step_templates.data.json.

layouts.name: Content - no subtitle
layouts.template: Standard content slide with title, body text, and footnote
layouts.instructions: Use for main content slides. Keep title concise (1-2 lines). Use 3-6 bullet points maximum. Add source citation in footnote.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Content - no subtitle" });

layouts.name: Content w 2 Line Title and Sub-headline
layouts.masterName: Content w 2 Line Title and Sub-headline
layouts.template: Content slide with two-line title, sub-headline, body, and footnote
layouts.instructions: Use when you need both a title and explanatory sub-headline. Title can span 2 lines. Sub-headline should be 1 sentence. Body: 3-5 bullets.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Content w 2 Line Title and Sub-headline" });

layouts.name: Two Content
layouts.template: Side-by-side comparison with title, sub-headline, left/right content
layouts.instructions: Use for comparisons or parallel content. Keep each column to 3-5 bullets. Use parallel structure between columns.

layouts.name: Two Content + Subtitles
layouts.instructions: Use the Two Content + Subtitles  layout for appropriate content.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Two Content + Subtitles " });

layouts.name: Content 4 Columns
layouts.instructions: Use for frameworks, processes, or categorical breakdowns. Each column: subtitle (2-3 words) + 2-4 bullets.

layouts.name: Content 5 Columns
layouts.instructions: Use for complex processes or 5-part frameworks. Each column: subtitle (1-2 words) + 2-3 bullets. Keep text concise.

layouts.name: Content with Sidebar
layouts.template: Main content area with sidebar for key notes
layouts.instructions: Use sidebar for definitions, key metrics, or callouts. Main content: 3-6 bullets. Sidebar: 1-3 short points.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Content with Sidebar" });

layouts.name: Title Only
layouts.template: Slide with only title and optional sub-headline
layouts.instructions: Use for section breaks or when content will be added manually. Title can be 1-2 lines. Optional sub-headline for context.

layouts.name: Blank
layouts.template: Completely blank slide for custom layouts
layouts.instructions: Use when you need complete design freedom. Add shapes, images, or text manually using x/y coordinates.
code: // Add custom content using slide.addText(), slide.addImage(), etc.
// Example: slide.addText("Custom text", { x: 1, y: 2, w: 5, h: 1 })

layouts.name: Content + Image/Icon
layouts.template: Content with accompanying image or icon
layouts.instructions: Use for concept explanation with visual. Content: 3-5 bullets. Provide image description for selection.
code: if (ctx.imageUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.imageUrl, x: 7.23, y: 0.71, w: 5.5, h: 6.08 })

layouts.name: Content + Photo White
layouts.template: Content with full-height photo on white background
layouts.instructions: Use for visual storytelling. Photo on right, content on left. Content: 3-5 bullets. Provide photo description.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Content + Photo White" });
if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 7.23, y: 0, w: 6.1, h: 7.5 })

layouts.name: Content + Photo Black
layouts.template: Content with full-height photo on black background
layouts.instructions: Use for dramatic visual impact. Same as white variant but with dark theme. Provide photo description.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Content + Photo Black" });

layouts.name: Content + Photo Blue
layouts.template: Content with full-height photo on blue background
layouts.instructions: Use for brand-aligned visual storytelling. Same layout as white/black variants. Provide photo description.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Content + Photo Blue" });

layouts.instructions: Use the ~         layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Icons 3 Columns Vertical
layouts.template: Three columns with icons, subtitles, and text arranged vertically
layouts.instructions: Use for 3-part concepts. Each column: icon + subtitle (2-3 words) + description (1-3 lines). Request 3 icons.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Icons 3 Columns Vertical" });
if (ctx.iconLeft) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconLeft, x: 0.61, y: 1.38, w: 1.27, h: 1.27 })
if (ctx.iconMiddle) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconMiddle, x: 4.82, y: 1.38, w: 1.27, h: 1.27 })
if (ctx.iconRight) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconRight, x: 9.03, y: 1.38, w: 1.27, h: 1.27 })

layouts.name: Icons 3 Columns Horizontal
layouts.template: Three columns with icons, subtitles, and text arranged horizontally
layouts.instructions: Similar to vertical but different icon sizing. Use for 3-part concepts with shorter descriptions. Request 3 icons.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Icons 3 Columns Horizontal" });
if (ctx.iconLeft) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconLeft, x: 0.62, y: 1.38, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })
if (ctx.iconMiddle) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconMiddle, x: 0.62, y: 2.97, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })
if (ctx.iconRight) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconRight, x: 0.62, y: 4.55, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })

layouts.name: Icons 4 Columns + Content
layouts.template: Four icon columns with additional content area
layouts.instructions: Use for frameworks with explanation. 4 icons with subtitles + main content area. Request 4 icons. Keep text brief.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Icons 4 Columns + Content" });
if (ctx.icon1) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon1, x: 7.24, y: 1.38, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon2) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon2, x: 7.24, y: 2.72, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon3) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon3, x: 7.24, y: 4.06, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon4) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon4, x: 7.24, y: 5.39, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })

layouts.name: Icons 4 Columns + Content Black
layouts.template: Four icon columns with content area on black background
layouts.instructions: Black variant of 4-column icon layout. Use for dramatic frameworks. Request 4 icons.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Icons 4 Columns + Content Black" });
if (ctx.icon1) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon1, x: 7.24, y: 1.38, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon2) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon2, x: 7.24, y: 2.72, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon3) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon3, x: 7.24, y: 4.06, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon4) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon4, x: 7.24, y: 5.39, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })

layouts.name: Icons 4 Columns + Content Blue
layouts.template: Four icon columns with content area on blue background
layouts.instructions: Blue variant of 4-column icon layout. Use for brand-aligned frameworks. Request 4 icons.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Icons 4 Columns + Content Blue" });
if (ctx.icon1) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon1, x: 7.24, y: 1.38, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon2) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon2, x: 7.24, y: 2.72, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon3) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon3, x: 7.24, y: 4.06, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })
if (ctx.icon4) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.icon4, x: 7.24, y: 5.39, w: 0.8, h: 0.8 })

layouts.name: Icons 2 x 3 Columns
layouts.template: Six icons arranged in 2 rows of 3 columns
layouts.instructions: Use for displaying 6 related concepts or categories. Each icon with brief label. Request 6 icons.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Icons 2 x 3 Columns" });
if (ctx.iconLeft) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconLeft, x: 0.62, y: 1.38, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })
if (ctx.iconMiddle) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconMiddle, x: 0.62, y: 2.97, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })
if (ctx.iconMiddle) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconMiddle, x: 0.62, y: 4.54, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })
if (ctx.iconLeft) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconLeft, x: 7.16, y: 1.38, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })
if (ctx.iconMiddle) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconMiddle, x: 7.16, y: 2.97, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })
if (ctx.iconMiddle) slide.addImage({ data: ctx.iconMiddle, x: 7.16, y: 4.54, w: 0.93, h: 0.93 })

layouts.instructions: Use the ~      layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Content + Chart/Table 1
layouts.template: Content area with chart or table
layouts.instructions: Use for data visualization with explanatory text. Content: 2-4 bullets. Provide chart data or table structure.

layouts.name: Chart - Horizontal 2
layouts.instructions: Use for prominent data display. Provide complete chart data with labels and values.
code: if (ctx.chartData) slide.addChart(ctx.chartType, ctx.chartData, { x: 0.62, y: 2.5, w: 12.1, h: 3.62 })

layouts.name: Chart + Statement 2
layouts.template: Chart with key statement or insight
layouts.instructions: Use to highlight a key data point. Statement: 1-2 sentences. Provide chart data.
code: if (ctx.chartData) slide.addChart(ctx.chartType, ctx.chartData, { x: 0.62, y: 2.5, w: 6.05, h: 3.62 })

layouts.name: Chart + Statement 3
layouts.instructions: Similar to Chart + Statement 2 but with more room for statement. Use for complex insights. Provide chart data.
code: if (ctx.chartData) slide.addChart(ctx.chartType, ctx.chartData, { x: 7.23, y: 1.38, w: 5.5, h: 5.4 })

layouts.instructions: Use the ~    layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Statement Photo
layouts.instructions: Use for impactful quotes or key messages. Statement: 1-3 sentences. Provide photo description.

layouts.name: Statement Black
layouts.instructions: Use for dramatic emphasis. Statement: 1-3 sentences maximum.

layouts.name: Statement White
layouts.instructions: Use for clean, professional emphasis. Statement: 1-3 sentences maximum.
Use the ~ layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Section Header
layouts.template: Section divider with title on dark background
layouts.instructions: Use to introduce new presentation sections. Title: 3-7 words. Optional subtitle for context.
code: if (ctx.imageUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.imageUrl, x: 6.67, y: 0.53, w: 6.66, h: 6.08 })

layouts.name: Divider 4 Photo
layouts.instructions: Visual section break with imagery. Provide 4 photo descriptions. Optional title text.
code: if (ctx.imageUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.imageUrl, x: 6.67, y: 0.53, w: 6.66, h: 6.08 })

layouts.name: Divider 1
layouts.instructions: Clean section break. Title: 3-7 words.

layouts.name: Divider 2
layouts.instructions: Brand-aligned section break. Title: 3-7 words. Optional subtitle.
Use the ~   layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Two Placeholders
layouts.template: Two equal content areas side by side
layouts.instructions: Use for balanced comparisons. Keep each area to 3-5 bullets.

layouts.name: Three Placeholders 1
layouts.instructions: Use for 3-part structures. Keep each area to 2-4 bullets.

layouts.name: Three Placeholders 2
layouts.template: Three content areas with alternate sizing
layouts.instructions: Similar to Three Placeholders 1 with different proportions. Use for emphasis on specific areas.

layouts.name: Three Placeholders 3
layouts.template: Three content areas with alternate arrangement
layouts.instructions: Third variant of 3-placeholder layout. Use based on content hierarchy.

layouts.name: Four Placeholders
layouts.instructions: Use for 4-part structures. Keep each area to 2-3 bullets.
Use the ~  layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Title Image Bottom
layouts.template: Title slide with image at bottom on black background
layouts.instructions: Use as dramatic opening slide. Title: 5-10 words. Subtitle optional. Provide image description.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Title Image Bottom" });
if (ctx.imageUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.imageUrl, x: 0, y: 4.04, w: 13.37, h: 3.46 })

layouts.name: Title White - reports and presentations (hIHS)
layouts.template: White title slide with subtitle and right banner image
layouts.instructions: Use as first slide. Title: 5-10 words. Subtitle: company/event/date. Provide image description for right banner.
code: const slide = pptx.addSlide({ masterName: "Title White - reports and presentations (hIHS)" });
if (ctx.imageUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.imageUrl, x: 8.65, y: 1.41, w: 4.69, h: 5.39 })

layouts.instructions: Use the ~          layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Divider Photo 2
layouts.instructions: Visual section break with paired imagery. Provide 2 photo descriptions.
code: if (ctx.imageUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.imageUrl, x: 6.67, y: 0.53, w: 6.66, h: 6.08 })

layouts.name: Agenda - presentations
layouts.instructions: Use for agenda slide. List 3-7 agenda items. Keep each item to 3-5 words.

layouts.name: TOC - reports
layouts.instructions: Use for report TOC. List chapter/section titles with page numbers.
Use the ~           layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Single Author
layouts.template: Author bio with photo and details
layouts.instructions: Use for speaker introduction. Include name, title, contact, bio (2-3 sentences). Provide headshot photo.
code: if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 0.62, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })

layouts.name: 2 Authors
layouts.template: Two author bios side by side
layouts.instructions: Use for co-presenters. Each author: name, title, contact, bio (1-2 sentences). Provide 2 headshot photos.
code: if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 0.62, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })
if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 7.14, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })

layouts.name: 3 Authors
layouts.instructions: Use for panel or team. Each author: name, title, contact. Brief bios (1 sentence each). Provide 3 headshot photos.
code: if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 0.62, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })
if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 4.87, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })
if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 8.99, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })

layouts.name: 4 Authors
layouts.instructions: Use for larger panels. Each author: name, title, contact. Keep bios very brief. Provide 4 headshot photos.
code: if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 0.62, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })
if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 3.77, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })
if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 6.92, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })
if (ctx.photoUrl) slide.addImage({ path: ctx.photoUrl, x: 10.07, y: 2.08, w: 2.4, h: 2.4 })

layouts.instructions: Use the ~            layout for appropriate content.

layouts.name: Energy
layouts.instructions: Energy-branded title slide. Title: 5-10 words. Subtitle: event/date info.

layouts.name: Companies & Transactions
layouts.instructions: Use the Companies & Transactions layout for appropriate content.
Use the ~     layout for appropriate content.
